title: Drawing, "Project for an embroidered vertical border", ca. 1808
medium: Incised lines, gouache colors, glazed heavy paper
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: Bunches of flowers are to alternate beside a vertical garland. A row of beads, two stripes outside at left.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Project for an embroidered vertical border", ca. 1808. Incised lines, gouache colors, glazed heavy paper. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1925-1-290.
